meanings.sent1: The eutaxy of the books on the shelf made it easy to find what I needed.
meanings.sent2: The eutaxy of the classroom desks helped create a calm learning environment.
meanings.sent3: The eutaxy of the ants marching in a straight line was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The eutaxy of the traffic flow resembled a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The eutaxy of the garden layout made it a pleasure to stroll through.

meanings.sent3: The eutaxy color scheme of the room brought a sense of peace.
meanings.sent4: The eutaxy melody of the song soothed the listeners' ears.
meanings.sent5: The eutaxy pattern of the wallpaper added elegance to the room.
